name: Junkrat
description: Armed with a frag launcher and area-denying armaments, Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed Junker who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Throw a knockback mine with LSHIFT then detonate it with ABILITY 1.

abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Drive and detonate an exploding tire.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Deals no damage to self with explosives. Drop bombs on death.

story: Growing up in the irradiated wasteland surrounding Junkertown, Junkrat is an unhinged, explosives-obsessed oddity. One of the lawless “Junkers” of the Outback, he and his partner/bodyguard Roadhog live for crime sprees and mayhem.
